text: A dapanir arɨzir ruarim sara itir arazir kam, gumazamizibar akagha ghaze, a God baghavɨra itir gumazimra. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a uabɨ nan damazimɨn mɨzeghan koghsɨ gumazitamɨn kuamɨn boroghɨn mangan kogham. Guizbangɨra an afeziam, o amebam, o aveghbuaba o buaramiziba arɨmɨghireghtɨ, a men kuabar boroghɨn mangan kogham. A kamaghɨn damigh, nan damazimɨn mɨzegham.
